{"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"'Return of the Jedi' is a science fiction and adventure movie released on May 25, 1983. Here's a detailed description:

- **Overview**: Luke Skywalker leads a mission to rescue his friend Han Solo from the clutches of Jabba the Hutt, while the Emperor seeks to neutralize the Rebellion with a second Death Star.
- **Budget**: $32,350,000
- **Revenue**: $475,100,000
- **Runtime**: 131 minutes
- **Genres**: Adventure, Action, Science Fiction
- Additional Details: The movie is part of the 'Star Wars Collection'.
- You can also explore more about the movie on [its official homepage](http://www.starwars.com/films/star-wars-episode-vi-return-of-the-jedi).

**Visuals**:
- [Movie Poster](https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/jQYlydvHm3kUix1f8prMucrplhm.jpg)
- [Backdrop Image](https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/iP2tEA2A77qhbhRfcFkiD6WFOqH.jpg)

Let me know if you'd like further information."}
